
```{r}
#| label = "DataName.lm"
DataName.lm = lm(ResponseName ~ BlockingName+FactorName, data=DataName)
library(broom)
augment(DataName.lm)
anova(DataName.lm)
```

```{r}
#| label = "glanceDataName.lm"
glance(DataName.lm) |> kable()
```

```{r}
#| label = "plotDataName.lm",
#| fig.cap = "Residual analysis for DataName.lm"
library(ggfortify)
autoplot(DataName.lm)
```
